    { 
#ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
        assert(lbound()<=i);
        assert(i<=A_.num_rows() + lbound() - 1);
        assert(lbound()<=j);
        assert(j<=A_.num_cols() + lbound() - 1);
#endif
        if (i<j) 
            return zero_;
        else
            return A_(i,j);
    }
